modName: LOTR - The Mines of Moria VERSION 4
summary: The Mines of Moria from lord of the rings recreated under the mountains of skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
CURRENTLY DOING UPDATES FINISHING A FEW GLITCHES AND LIGHTING


The Mines of Moria from lord of the rings recreated under the mountains of skyrim! Version 1 was much smaller than this new one and more of a dull journey. 

Version 4 of the Mines of Moria features
   Epic scenery
   Movie References
   Awesome architecture 
   Familiar scenes from the movie

Version 4 Gameplay offers
   A longer and more epic journey through the mines
   More creature encounters
   Harder difficulty
   4 parts to the journey

Version 4 misc
   There is an exit to Ivastead
   Features a door into the endless stair which takes you to the throat of the world (Caradhras - for all the fans)
   Bridge of Khazadum leads to an exit into skyrim
   Temple of Durin
   More enemies
   Caverns of Moria - cave system

Version 4 Recommendations
   You should take a bow with, or other wise your screwed
   And have fun with it - do some exploring
BRING A TORCH OR A LIGHTING SPELL!


Thanx guys - hope you enjoy and i love to hear the feedback and any ideas (for current projects or other locations i could make!)

CURRENTLY DOING UPDATES FINISHING A FEW GLITCHES AND LIGHTING


IDEAS FOR THIS PROJECT ALL COMES FROM THE WORKS OF TOLKIEN
Dwaugh@
author: dwaugh2
